subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Shiffrin won her fourth World Cup slalom race of the season, beating Veronika Velez-Zuzulova by 1.41 seconds in Are, Sweden.
snippet: Shiffrin won her fourth World Cup slalom race of the season, beating Veronika Velez-Zuzulova by 1.41 seconds in Are, Sweden.
